醋勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 醋勁|醋劲[cu4 jin4]

醋海生波.definition: lit. waves on a sea of vinegar; trouble caused by a jealous woman (idiom)

醋磺內酯鉀.definition: acesulfame potassium; acesulfame K (an artificial sweetener)

醋罈子.definition: vinegar jar; (fig.) person of a jealous nature

醋酸纖維.definition: cellulose acetate (used for film and fiber)
